coreAttributes.name: arming sword
coreAttributes.description: This straight-edged sword has a single-handed cruciform hilt. The 75cm-long blade is made out of ethereal arcane energy, which, instead of cutting someone, drains their energy as it passes through them.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Slash at [npc2.name] with your arming sword.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(position)] [npc.her] arming sword at [npc.her] hip, so that [npc.she] may draw it at a moment's notice.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(sheath)] [npc.her] arming sword, before putting it away.

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slash)] [npc.her] arming sword at [npc2.name], grinning as the ethereal arcane blade travels through [npc2.her] body!
Slashing out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] arming sword, [npc.name] [npc.verb(grin)] as [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] the ethereal blade travel straight through [npc2.her] body!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(slash)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] arming sword, causing [npc2.herHim] to stagger back as the ethereal blade passes right through [npc2.her] chest!

missDescriptions.missText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slash)] [npc.her] arming sword at [npc2.name], but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
Slashing out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] arming sword, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(slash)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] arming sword, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
